info.title: Point of Sale API
info.description: API Documentation for Point of Sale Application

post.summary: Upload image for an adjustment product

get.summary: List all adjustment products with optional filters and pagination

parameters.name: type
parameters.description: Filter by adjustment type (0: plus, 1: minus)

parameters.name: status
parameters.description: Filter by status (0: active, 1: disabled, 2: deleted)

parameters.name: user_id
parameters.description: Filter stock quantity by user/branch ID

total_stock.description: Total stock quantity across all branches

get.summary: List all stock products with optional filters
Get all users by role without pagination

product_id.description: Product ID must exist in products table

user_id.description: User ID must exist in users table

stock_id.description: Stock ID must exist in stock_products table

image.description: Product image file (jpeg, png, jpg, gif up to 2MB)
